name: Gatekeeper: Eclipse
description:
In Gatekeeper: Eclipse you'll find:

  • Three unique locations of The Nowhere.
  • Around 1000 enemies will rush you in order to steal the Heart of Time.
  • Various Gates to defend from the waves of enemies.
  • New mechanic: the enemies will emerge from the portals.
  • If you don't clear the location from all enemies, they will follow you to the next lvl.
  • Free skills on each lvl.
  • The prologue includes two endings.
